abstract: On Tuesday, Fox News Channel was the most-watched network from 10 to 11 p.m.
snippet: On Tuesday, Fox News Channel was the most-watched network from 10 to 11 p.m.
lead_paragraph: About 21.5 million viewers watched the first full night of the Republican National Convention on Tuesday, the night before Governor Sarah Palin gave her address, Nielsen estimated. The convention was not broadcast on television Monday due to the landfall of Hurricane Gustav, but the Tuesday session featured Senator Joseph I. Lieberman speaking during prime time.

headline.main: Conventions: In a Repeat of 2004, Fox News Beats Broadcasters
